content:
1
▪Built a centralized data infrastructure using Smartsheet to gather raw data from multiple 
data sources and stakeholders with minimum manual intervention
▪Set up automated checks and notifications to identify inconsistencies in the data such as 
missing entries, irregular formats etc. and immediately notify the relevant stakeholders
▪Built an executive dashboard – Macro View, summarizing the key aspects of the business 
initiatives in both TPO and TSA in a concise yet insightful manner
Multi-channel Video Streaming & Satellite Service Provider 
(PMO Analytics )

PMO DASHBOARD FOR MULTICHANNEL VIDEO PROGRAMMING DISTRIBUTOR
SITUATION
▪Client had limited visibility into the progress made on the PMO initiatives across multiple verticals (with estimated savings of ~$5 Bn) due to lack of data warehouse 
and automated reporting suite. Client was spending significant person-hours to gather data and create aggregated monthly reports manually.
▪Merilytics partnered with the client to develop a robust data architecture and create visuals for TPO (Transformation Program Office)  and TSA (Transition Service 
Agreement) initiatives in order to reduce the manual effort to showcase the overall performance of all business initiatives
▪Built a centralized data infrastructure using Smartsheet to gather raw data from multiple data sources and stakeholders with minimum manual intervention 
▪Set up automated checks and notifications to identify inconsistencies in the data such as missing entries, irregular formats etc. and immediately notify the relevant 
stakeholders
▪Created consolidated datasets for data across multiple categories such as financials, milestones, jeopardies etc. in the reporting tables for easy access to stakeholders 
to create Smartsheet reports and to facilitate data ingestion to the Power BI model
▪Created multiple dashboards, such as Program Overview, Jeopardy Overview, Milestone Summary, Monthly overview, Financial Performance and Scorecards, and 
Financial Outlook allowing users to track the overall status, jeopardies, and financial data. Added drill down filters to KPI level as well as annual and monthly level within 
the dashboards to get detailed insights of revenue and savings achieved against the target.
▪Built an executive dashboard – Macro View, summarizing the key aspects of the business initiatives in both TPO and TSA in a concise yet insightful manner
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪The automated reporting suite helped the client save ~60 person-hours per month on creating the weekly and monthly reports manually
▪The performance reports with daily data updates helped the BU stakeholders have improved visibility into the overall progress of initiatives, milestones, and financial 
performance to take more informed decisions and reduce TAT to address jeopardies
▪Blended Macro-View helped the Senior leadership team to present a comprehensive insight of the businesses’ present status and prospects
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client is a multichannel video programming distributor in the U.S. with 15M+ subscriber base
2

LEARNINGS
▪
We were able to get a better understanding on smartsheet architecture given this was the first project on smartsheet in Merilytics
▪
We got a good understanding of various services and products offered by the client and the milestones that can be associated with the initiative
▪
Overall, it gave us a better idea of functioning of program management office
